text: As You Desire Me is a 1932 American drama movie directed by George Fitzmaurice and was based on the 1929 play by Luigi Pirandello. It stars Greta Garbo, Melvyn Douglas, Erich von Stroheim, Owen Moore, Hedda Hopper, Rafaela Ottiano, Albert Conti and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1932 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by George Fitzmaurice Category:Movies about alcoholism
title: As You Desire Me (movie)
